primary_assets.description: Conduct real-time research on the following assets: Stocks, Real-Estate, Mutual Funds, Bank Deposits and PPFs. Make sure that real-time data for each asset mentioned should be there in your report. Write a report based on the data collected. Your report should be between 300-500 words. Make sure to write the report clearly and concisely!
primary_assets.expected_output: A detailed report summarizing key findings on each of these assets, highlighting important insights. Proper subheadings might be used. Report should be 300-500 words.

secondary_assets.description: Conduct real-time research on the following assets: Exchange Traded funds, Derivatives, crypto, commodities and bonds. Make sure that real-time data for each asset mentioned should be there in your report. Write a report based on the data collected. Your report should be between 300-500 words. Make sure to write the report clearly and concisely!
secondary_assets.expected_output: A detailed report summarizing key findings on each of these assets, highlighting important insights. Proper subheadings might be used. Report should be 300-500 words.
